name: Bootcrate
description:
Bootcrate and the Totally Amazing Tokens!
Make big profits and buy the one of a kind Bootcrate on this RAD clicker game.
On each Bootcrate there is 1 of  27 Unique Priceless (10$) tokens!
WILL YOU COLLECT THEM ALL? or FAIL AT IT; YOU CHOSE, PLAY NOW!

* Disclaimer: All ingame currency is fictional, and has no monetary value. I do not encourage gambling, but this game is meant to mock at it and the modern use of loot boxes in games.
